price: Moo “Weellisaadha; dhufuu du’aa isa irratti eegna” jedhanii?
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٞ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيۡبَ ٱلۡمَنُونِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna shāʿirun natarabbaṣu bihi rayba al-manūni
